languages.text: "Ты уже осудил себя и приговорил к годам мучений. Я не могу дать тебе нового наказания — только простить. И ты прости себя".

traits.locale_text: "Ты уже осудил себя и приговорил к годам мучений. Я не могу дать тебе нового наказания — только простить. И ты прости себя, Вайс".

languages.text: "You have already condemned yourself to years of torment. I cannot give you a new punishment — only forgiveness. And you must forgive yourself."
languages.original_text: "Ты уже осудил себя и приговорил к годам мучений. Я не могу дать тебе нового наказания — только простить. И ты прости себя".

traits.locale_text: "You have already condemned yourself to years of torment. I cannot give you a new punishment — only forgiveness. And you must forgive yourself."
"You have already condemned yourself to years of torment. I cannot give you a new punishment — only forgiveness. And you must forgive yourself."
"You have already condemned yourself to years of torment. I cannot give you a new punishment — only forgiveness. And you must forgive yourself."
"You have already condemned yourself to years of torment. I cannot give you a new punishment — only forgiveness. And you must forgive yourself."
"You have already condemned yourself to years of torment. I cannot give you a new punishment — only forgiveness. And you must forgive yourself."
"You have already condemned yourself to years of torment. I cannot give you a new punishment — only forgiveness. And you must forgive yourself."

languages.text: «Ya se ha condenado usted mismo a muchos años de tormento. No puedo imponerle otro castigo; tan solo puedo perdonarle. Y usted también debería hacerlo».
languages.original_text: "You have already condemned yourself to years of torment. I cannot give you a new punishment — only forgiveness. And you must forgive yourself."

traits.locale_text: «Ya se ha condenado usted mismo a muchos años de tormento. No puedo imponerle otro castigo; tan solo puedo perdonarle. Y usted también debería hacerlo».

languages.text: 「あなたは既に何年もの苦しみに身を晒しているので、あなたに新たな罰を与えることはできない。自分自身を赦すべきだ」
languages.original_text: "You have already condemned yourself to years of torment. I cannot give you a new punishment — only forgiveness. And you must forgive yourself."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは既に何年もの苦しみに身を晒しているので、あなたに新たな罰を与えることはできない。自分自身を赦すべきだ」

languages.text: “你已经让自己遭受了这么多年的折磨，我不能继续对你施加新的惩罚了。我能给你的只有宽恕，而且你自己也必须宽恕你自己。”
languages.original_text: "You have already condemned yourself to years of torment. I cannot give you a new punishment — only forgiveness. And you must forgive yourself."

traits.locale_text: “你已经让自己遭受了这么多年的折磨，我不能继续对你施加新的惩罚了。我能给你的只有宽恕，而且你自己也必须宽恕你自己。”

languages.text: "Ihr habt Euch bereits selbst zu jahrelanger Folter verdammt. Ich kann Euch keine weitere Strafe auferlegen ... ich kann Euch nur vergeben. Und Ihr müsst euch selbst vergeben."
languages.original_text: "You have already condemned yourself to years of torment. I cannot give you a new punishment — only forgiveness. And you must forgive yourself."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt Euch bereits selbst zu jahrelanger Folter verdammt. Ich kann Euch keine weitere Strafe auferlegen ... ich kann Euch nur vergeben. Und Ihr müsst euch selbst vergeben."

languages.text: « Vous vous êtes déjà condamné à des années de tourment. Je ne peux vous châtier davantage. En revanche, je peux vous offrir mon pardon. Quant à vous, vous devez vous pardonner à vous-même. »
languages.original_text: "You have already condemned yourself to years of torment. I cannot give you a new punishment — only forgiveness. And you must forgive yourself."

traits.locale_text: « Vous vous êtes déjà condamné à des années de tourment. Je ne peux vous châtier davantage. En revanche, je peux vous offrir mon pardon. Quant à vous, vous devez vous pardonner à vous-même. »

languages.text: "Hâlihazırda kendini seneler süren eziyetle cezalandırdın. Sana yeni bir ceza veremem. Yalnızca seni bağışlayabilirim. Sen de kendini bağışlamalısın."
languages.original_text: "You have already condemned yourself to years of torment. I cannot give you a new punishment — only forgiveness. And you must forgive yourself."
